name: Amazon API Gateway
short: A fully managed service for creating, securing, and publishing APIs at scale on AWS.
description: Amazon API Gateway is a fully managed service that makes it easy for developers to create, publish, maintain, monitor, and secure APIs at any scale. It allows users to connect to data sources, create and deploy custom APIs, and use built-in SDKs to access data from web, mobile, and IoT applications. With features like throttling, caching, and authorization, Amazon API Gateway ensures a secure and efficient way of connecting applications, data, and services.
